argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tmsval.m | |- M = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } |
| 2 |  | tmsval.k | |- K = ( toMetSp ` D ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X e. dom *Met ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-ds | |- dist = Slot ; 1 2 |
| 5 |  | #P_1nn | |- 1 e. NN |
| 6 |  | #P_2nn0 | |- 2 e. NN0 |
| 7 |  | #P_1nn0 | |- 1 e. NN0 |
| 8 |  | #P_1lt10 | |- 1 < 10 |
| 9 | 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_declti | |- 1 < ; 1 2 |
| 10 |  | #P_2nn | |- 2 e. NN |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_decnncl | |- ; 1 2 e. NN |
| 12 | 1, 4, 9, 11 | #P_2strbas | |- ( X e. dom *Met -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 13 | 3, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_xmetf | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* -> D Fn ( X X. X ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fnresdm | |- ( D Fn ( X X. X ) -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) = D ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_3syl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) = D ) |
| 18 | 1, 4, 9, 11 | #P_2strop | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D = ( dist ` M ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_reseq1d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 20 | 17, 19 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 2 | #P_tmsval | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 22 | 13, 20, 21 | #P_setsmsbas | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 23 | 13, 20, 21 | #P_setsmsds | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( dist ` M ) = ( dist ` K ) ) |
| 24 | 18, 23 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D = ( dist ` K ) ) |
| 25 |  | #P_prex | |- { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } e. _V |
| 26 | 1, 25 | #P_eqeltri | |- M e. _V |
| 27 | 26 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> M e. _V ) |
| 28 | 13, 20, 21, 27 | #P_setsmstopn | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) |
| 29 | 22, 24, 28 | #P_3jca | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( X = ( Base ` K ) /\ D = ( dist ` K ) /\ ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) ) ) |
